experimentData.title: Experiment Data
experimentData.description: View and manage data associated with this experiment.

dataSources.description: This section will show datasets, files, and other data sources associated with your experiment.

downloadModal.title: Download Dataset
downloadModal.description: Prepare download for the '{{tableName}}' dataset. For very large datasets, the download is automatically split into multiple parts to ensure a smooth and efficient experience.

success.title: Download preparation complete!
success.description: {{count}} file(s) ready for download. Total size: {{totalSize}}, Total rows: {{totalRows}}
